neighbors.name: Kenneth R. Cortner
neighbors.claims: Kenneth R. Cortner’s family has longstanding ties to Princeton in Caldwell County (e.g., a relative’s obituary was handled by a local Princeton funeral home) [Morgan’s Funeral Home](https://www.morgansfuneralhome.com/obituaries/Billy-Joe-Cortner?obId=1102543). He holds no known public office or high-profile civic role in Caldwell County, and his name is absent from lists of county officials [Caldwell County Gov](https://caldwellcounty.ky.gov/elected-officials/Pages/magistrates.aspx).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respected local farmer or extension agent acknowledge the Cortner family’s long history in the area and discuss how any project plans will respect his farmland and family legacy.

neighbors.name: Rickie W. Williams
neighbors.claims: Rickie W. Williams is a certified public accountant in Princeton, Kentucky, running an accounting practice that serves local individuals and businesses [DoTax Directory](https://www.dotax.com/accountant/kentucky/princeton/rickie-w-williams-cpa/390188). He has years of experience as an IRS-registered tax preparer handling personal and small-business filings in the community [DoTax Directory](https://www.dotax.com/accountant/kentucky/princeton/rickie-w-williams-cpa/390188).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage him with a project representative who can discuss economic impacts. Emphasize local tax revenue benefits and address any concerns about property values or financial details to appeal to his professional perspective.

neighbors.name: Holly Michelle Greene
neighbors.claims: Holly Michelle Greene is identified as a local property owner in Caldwell County, but little information about her background or occupation is publicly documented [Caldwell County Gov](https://caldwellcounty.ky.gov/elected-officials/Pages/magistrates.aspx). She does not hold any known public positions; for example, her name is not found among local board or committee rosters [Caldwell Co. Extension Board](https://caldwellcounty.ky.gov/boards/Pages/county-extension-office-board.aspx).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via a friendly community liaison or neighbor to build trust. Emphasize measures to preserve the area’s quiet rural character and minimize visual impact, addressing her likely concerns about privacy and views.

overview_summary: All three profiled neighbors have not publicly stated a clear stance on the development, so their positions remain unknown. Community influence among them appears limited – one neighbor (Rickie W. Williams) has moderate influence as a long-time local CPA, while the others have low public profiles. Their backgrounds range from a long-time local landowner to a tax professional, suggesting varied perspectives and concerns.
